summary: Living in exile after the death of their father, the grown children of a murdered and usurped king converge to exact eye-for-an-eye revenge.
cast: Irene Papas|Giannis Fertis|Aleka Katselli|Theano Ioannidou|Notis Peryalis|Takis Emmanuel|Fivos Razi|Manos Katrakis|Eleni Karpeta|Kitty Arseni|E. Chatzeemichalee|Theano Krassa|M. title: Electra
